### Single thumb slider oriented horizontally
```jsx

<Slider
    id='slider1'
    inForm={false}
    className={'container'}
    min={0}
    max={100}
    step={1}
    orientation={'horizontal'}
    ariaLabel ={'Seek bar'}
    labels={[
        {
            labelId: 'labelId2',
            labelString: "0",
            labelPositioning: "start"
        },
        {
            labelId: 'labelId3',
            labelString: "100",
            labelPositioning: "end"
        }
    ]}
    showLabels={true}
    showTooltip={true}
    sliderThumbs = {[
        {
            id: 'slider_thumb_id_1',
            value: 40,
            ariaValueText: '40 percent'
        }
    ]}
/>
```

### Single thumb slider oriented vertically
```jsx
    <Slider
        id='slider2'
        inForm={false}
        min={0}
        max={100}
        ariaLabel ={'Vertical seek bar'}
        step={1}
        orientation={'vertical'}
        labels={[
            {
                labelId: 'labelId4',
                labelString: "0",
                labelPositioning: "start"
            },
            {
                labelId: 'labelId5',
                labelString: "100",
                labelPositioning: "end"
            }
        ]}
        showLabels={true}
        showTooltip={true}
        sliderThumbs = {[
            {
                id: 'slider_thumb_id_2',
                value: 30,
                ariaValueText: '30 percent'
            }
        ]}
    />
```

### Range slider horizontally oriented
```jsx
 <Slider
        id='slider2'
        inForm={false}
        min={0}
        max={100}
        ariaLabel ={'Ranger slider'}
        step={1}
        orientation={'horizontal'}
        labels={[
            {
                labelId: 'labelId4',
                labelString: "0",
                labelPositioning: "start"
            },
            {
                labelId: 'labelId5',
                labelString: "100",
                labelPositioning: "end"
            }
        ]}
        showLabels={true}
        showTooltip={true}
        sliderThumbs = {[
            {
                id: 'slider_thumb_id_3',
                value: 0,
                ariaValueText: '0 percent'
            },
            {
                id: 'slider_thumb_id_4',
                value: 60,
                ariaValueText: '60 percent'
            }
        ]}
    />
```

### Range slider vertically oriented
```jsx
 <Slider
        id='slider2'
        inForm={false}
        min={0}
        max={100}
        ariaLabel ={'Vertical range slider'}
        step={10}
        orientation={'vertical'}
        labels={[
            {
                labelId: 'labelId6',
                labelString: "0",
                labelPositioning: "start"
            },
            {
                labelId: 'labelId7',
                labelString: "100",
                labelPositioning: "end"
            }
        ]}
        showLabels={true}
        showTooltip={true}
        sliderThumbs = {[
            {
                id: 'slider_thumb_id_5',
                value: 0,
                ariaValueText: '0 percent'
            },
            {
                id: 'slider_thumb_id_6',
                value: 60,
                ariaValueText: '60 percent'
            }
        ]}
    />
```

### Slider with a progressbar
```jsx

<Slider
    id='slider1'
    inForm={false}
    className={'container'}
    fillTrackValue={63}
    min={0}
    max={100}
    ariaLabel ={'Seek bar'}
    step={1}
    orientation={'horizontal'}
    showProgressBar={true}
    trackProgressClass={'bg-success opacity-40'}
    labels={[
        {
            labelId: 'labelId8',
            labelString: "0",
            labelPositioning: "start"
        },
        {
            labelId: 'labelId9',
            labelString: "100",
            labelPositioning: "end"
        }
    ]}
    showLabels={true}
    showTooltip={true}
    sliderThumbs = {[
        {
            id: 'slider_thumb_id_7',
            value: 60,
            ariaValueText: '60 percent'
        }
    ]}
/>
```

### SASS variables

```scss { "sassVariablesFile": "../scss/_variables.scss"}
```
### All Examples

```jsx noeditor
<div class="vvt-slider">
<Slider
    id='slider1'
    inForm={false}
    className={'container'}
    min={0}
    max={100}
    ariaLabel ={'Seek bar'}
    step={1}
    orientation={'horizontal'}
    labels={[
        {
            labelId: 'labelId2',
            labelString: "0",
            labelPositioning: "start"
        },
        {
            labelId: 'labelId3',
            labelString: "100",
            labelPositioning: "end"
        }
    ]}
    showLabels={true}
    showTooltip={true}
    sliderThumbs = {[
        {
            id: 'slider_thumb_id_1',
            value: 40,
            ariaValueText: '40 percent'
        }
    ]}
/>
<br />
<Slider
        id='slider2'
        inForm={false}
        min={0}
        max={100}
        ariaLabel ={'Vertical Seek bar'}
        step={1}
        orientation={'vertical'}
        labels={[
            {
                labelId: 'labelId4',
                labelString: "0",
                labelPositioning: "start"
            },
            {
                labelId: 'labelId5',
                labelString: "100",
                labelPositioning: "end"
            }
        ]}
        showLabels={true}
        showTooltip={true}
        sliderThumbs = {[
            {
                id: 'slider_thumb_id_2',
                value: 30,
                ariaValueText: '30 percent'
            }
        ]}
    />
    <br />
    <Slider
        id='slider2'
        inForm={false}
        min={0}
        max={100}
        ariaLabel ={'Range slider'}
        step={1}
        orientation={'horizontal'}
        labels={[
            {
                labelId: 'labelId4',
                labelString: "0",
                labelPositioning: "start"
            },
            {
                labelId: 'labelId5',
                labelString: "100",
                labelPositioning: "end"
            }
        ]}
        showLabels={true}
        showTooltip={true}
        sliderThumbs = {[
            {
                id: 'slider_thumb_id_3',
                value: 0,
                ariaValueText: '0 percent'
            },
            {
                id: 'slider_thumb_id_4',
                value: 60,
                ariaValueText: '60 percent'
            }
        ]}
    />
    <br />
   <Slider
        id='slider2'
        inForm={false}
        min={0}
        max={100}
        ariaLabel ={'Vertical range slider'}
        step={10}
        orientation={'vertical'}
        labels={[
            {
                labelId: 'labelId6',
                labelString: "0",
                labelPositioning: "start"
            },
            {
                labelId: 'labelId7',
                labelString: "100",
                labelPositioning: "end"
            }
        ]}
        showLabels={true}
        showTooltip={true}
        sliderThumbs = {[
            {
                id: 'slider_thumb_id_5',
                value: 0,
                ariaValueText: '0 percent'
            },
            {
                id: 'slider_thumb_id_6',
                value: 60,
                ariaValueText: '60 percent'
            }
        ]}
    />
    <br />
    <Slider
    id='slider1'
    inForm={false}
    className={'container'}
    fillTrackValue={63}
    min={0}
    max={100}
    ariaLabel ={'Seek bar'}
    step={1}
    orientation={'horizontal'}
    showProgressBar={true}
    trackProgressClass={'bg-success opacity-40'}
    labels={[
        {
            labelId: 'labelId8',
            labelString: "0",
            labelPositioning: "start"
        },
        {
            labelId: 'labelId9',
            labelString: "100",
            labelPositioning: "end"
        }
    ]}
    showLabels={true}
    showTooltip={true}
    sliderThumbs = {[
        {
            id: 'slider_thumb_id_7',
            value: 60,
            ariaValueText: '60 percent'
        }
    ]}
/> 
</div>
```
